title: Textile, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: lampas: plain weave foundation. Supplementary weave is plain weave with no interlaced connection.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 153 x 58 cm (60 1/4 x 22 13/16 in.)
Repeat H: 65.5 cm (25 13/16 in.)
creditline: Musum purchase through gift of Mrs. Florence Matthews
description: The pattern is yellow on blue.
